item.description:
Due to overwhelming (heh, well, certainly enough:-) interest, Waterfire is on!!

Some of us Irish Festival folk will be heading back "north" (ha) into Providence for Waterfire on the way "home" from the Irish Festival. We'll definitely be missing the initial lighting (scheduled for 7:22 p.m.), and just plan on soaking up the music and ambiance of the "sparkling bonfires" for a couple of hours to close the evening. Waterfire is definitely a sight to behold, and the labor day weekend is one that might provide fewer crowds with the natives fleeing the city for their last breath of beach air.

Check out the website for details:http://www.waterfire....

If your Labor day Saturday plans are ending early, and are interested in joining this evening, we'll be meeting at the street level entrance to Providence Place Mall beside Uno's etc at about 8:30 ish. Bear with us as we are en route, but we'll definitely be shooting for 8:30 to catch one more night of flames before summers end.

Sigh, a moment of silence for the tragedy of summers end:-)
item.how_to_find_us: Email me directly for my cell number.
item.name: Waterfire Providence
